document.full_text: lured to a home by a girl's text message, a 15-year-old central florida boy was beaten, shot and burned to death by a group of teenagers and young adults, police said on wednesday.
document.title: five face murder charges after florida teen's violent death
lines_and_colors: lured to a home by a girl's text message, a 15-year-old central florida boy was beaten, shot and burned to death by a group of teenagers and young adults, police said on wednesday.
